mapper.select: select * from recipe_info natural join members
select * from recipe_info natural join members where recipe_name like CONCAT('%',#{recipe_Name},'%')
select ing_category,category_name from ingredient group by(ing_category)
select * from recipe_info natural join recipe_category natural join category natural join members where category_id = #{category_id} limit 3;

select info.recipe_id, info.price, pur_member_id, info.member_id from recipe_info info join pur_recipe pur on info.recipe_id = pur.recipe_id where info.recipe_id = #{recipe_id} and pur_member_id = #{member_id};
mapper.update: update members set fork = fork-1 where member_id = #{member_id}
